name: Doll's Escape
description:
Doll's Escape is about a 3D, side scrolling platformer, thriller game which you play as a doll trying to escape a haunted orphanage.

Nicole is a ragdoll that was thrown away from her previous owner. She was left in the middle of nowhere. One day, a group of children were passing by and saw her. One of the children picked her up and brought her back. She was happy as she has a new owner now but it was a false hope. The group of children lives in a house that is run by a witch who uses the children as sacrifices for her life prolonging ritual. The house was filled with candles and disturbing writing on the walls. Nicole could not stand it and wanted to leave the house but as expected, a house that belongs to a witch believer will stop all people from leaving the house as the house is possessed by dead children that were sacrificed over the years and had possessed the house.

This game was made by FireBreath Studios which consists of 1 Designer, 2 Artists and 4 Programmers.

  • Allen Nui, Lead Designer, allennui99@gmail.com, https://allennui.wixsite.com/home

  • Thong Jing Wen,  Background Artist, jingwent224@gmail.com, https://www.artstation.com/jing_wen
  •  Yap Yi Heng, Gameplay Programmer, yiheng98@yahoo.com
